paragraphs:
AI, NLP, and Python engineer with hands-on experience building production-grade backend systems, machine learning
pipelines, and Al-driven applications. Strong background in developing FastAPI-based services, Retrieval-Augmented
Generation (RAG) pipelines, and cloud-native deployments across AWS and Azure. Proven ability to take models from
experimentation to real-time inference, optimize performance, and automate manual workflows.

Comfortable working in
fast-paced Agile environments and collaborating closely with product, data, and engineering teams. • Built NLP and retrieval pipelines at Doublene, deploying LLM-powered services for real-time search and conversational
use cases. • Developed ML scoring tools and backend APIs at Lamar University, streamlining vendor, billing, and data-processing
workflows.

• Built large-scale messaging and automation services at Techecy, supporting production traffic exceeding one million API
requests per day.
